name: davidkrk-website
description: Website for David KRK - Techno DJ & Producer

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run optimize-images && mkdir dist
scripts.postbuild: xcopy /E /I /Y images dist\images && copy *.html dist\ && copy CNAME dist\ && copy robots.txt dist\ && copy sitemap.xml dist\
scripts.start: npm run build && npx serve dist
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch & npx serve dist
scripts.validate: npm run validate:html && npm run validate:css
